channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Thousands of flights in danger of cancellation as FAA announces major cuts
item.description: The government shutdown-spurred airport chaos is about to get a whole lot worse. The Federal Aviation Administration said Wednesday it will reduce flight volumes by 10 percent across 40 major airports in response, a move that could threaten 3,000 to 4,500 flights daily. The cuts will affect “high volume” markets, including in Atlanta, Dallas, New […]...

item.title: 10 millions de Français regardent Netflix avec de la pub
item.description: En France, près de la moitié de la population regarde Netflix. Et 10 millions le font via un abonnement avec pub, selon de nouveaux chiffres Médiamétrie. Un véritable carton qui confirme l'implantation dans l'Hexagone de la plateforme de streaming, qui a trouvé le point d'équilibre pour ne pas inonder les abonnés avec de la réclame.

item.title: Ce laptop Dell polyvalent avec écran 120 Hz et Ryzen 7 chute sous les 500 € en plein pré-Black Friday
item.description: Idéal pour la bureautique, et même pour du jeu léger, le Dell 15 DC15255 est une machine polyvalente qui a aussi l'avantage d'être pratique à transporter. En ce pré-Black Friday, vous trouverez ce modèle sous Ryzen 7 affiché à 499 euros au lieu de 649 euros.

item.title: New teaser hints that two of the most anticipated X-Men might come to Marvel Rivals soon
item.description: It looks like Marvel Rivals will soon introduce two of the most anticipated X-Men to the roster.

item.title: Valve just made Steam Deck downloads much easier – and I hope this feature comes to all SteamOS handhelds
item.description: Valve has just released a new Steam Deck 'display-off low-power download' update, but it's currently only available via the beta and preview channels.

item.title: Ce qui est en train de se passer à la Nasa, sous l’effet du shutdown, devrait tous nous inquiéter
item.description: Alors que nous arrivons au 36e jour du shutdown, ce qui en fait le plus long de l'histoire américaine, la Nasa souffre de difficultés croissantes. Dans quel état retrouvera-t-on l'agence spatiale au terme de cette épreuve ?

item.title: The Best Cheap Headphones We’ve Tried
item.description: You could fill a stadium or two with all the cheap headphones out there. We tested a ton of the best headphones under $100 to help you pick the right pair.

item.title: Watch those typos - email mistakes are causing significant security issues
item.description: Emails sent to the wrong address cause quite a lot of trouble and rake up billions in fines.

item.title: Swytch est en grande difficulté, un plan de sauvetage est en cours pour l’un des leaders des kits d’électrification pour vélo
item.description: Visiblement en difficulté financière, Swytch tente de se restructurer à travers un plan de sauvetage soutenu par ses investisseurs historiques. Le spécialiste britannique des kits d’électrification pour vélos espère ainsi sécuriser sa trésorerie.

item.title: Foursquare’s founder launches a new app that talks to you about your neighborhood
item.description: After teasing its development last year, Foursquare co-founder Dennis Crowley has now launched BeeBot: an AI-powered social app for iPhones that talks to you about what’s happening nearby. In his blog announcement, Crowley says BeeBot behaves like a “personalized radio DJ” that provides location-based audio updates through your headphones, telling you about what friends are […]...

item.title: Apple's $1 billion AI gamble might be too late to tempt users back to Apple Intelligence
item.description: Apple and Google are about to sign a lucrative AI deal, but can Gemini fix Apple's AI woes? I think it's too little too late.

item.title: Fairphone’s sustainable, repairable noise-cancelling headphones are finally coming to the US. Here’s why you should pay attention
item.description: These headphones are built to be better for the environment and for your conscience too

item.title: Kodak's trending Charmera keyring camera is a great gift idea – I'd preorder the 'blind box' now and hope it lands in time for the holidays
item.description: Kodak's Charmera digital keyring camera comes in a 'blind box' in any one of six colorways, and costs just $30 / £30, which makes it a great gift idea.

item.title: Snaps new AI search engine will be powered by Perplexity
item.description: Snap has partnered with Perplexity AI to make its chat smarter.

item.title: Casio redesigns an iconic G-Shock model – with Garmin-style screen tech
item.description: The Casio G-Shock GW-BX5600-1 boasts MIP display tech for a better experience in strong sunlight.

item.title: Les meilleurs casques audio Bluetooth en novembre 2025 – La sélection Frandroid
item.description: Vous ne savez pas quel casque Bluetooth choisir dans cet océan de références ? Nous avons réalisé une sélection des meilleurs casques audio Bluetooth parmi tous ceux que nous avons pu tester.

item.title: Matt Smith Is Preparing to Enter ‘Star Wars’ Later This Year
item.description: Plus, Guy Fawkes opens a portal to hell in a new movie.

item.title: When Thunderstorms Hit, Asthma Can Become an ER Nightmare
item.description: New research is the latest to find that thunderstorms can worsen your odds of a serious seasonal asthma attack.

item.title: Inception raises $50 million to build diffusion models for code and text
item.description: Diffusion models already power AI image generators, but Inception thinks they can be even more powerful applied in software development.

item.title: Google debuts AI chips with 4X performance boost, secures Anthropic megadeal worth billions
item.description: Google Cloud is introducing what it calls its most powerful artificial intelligence infrastructure to date, unveiling a seventh-generation Tensor Processing Unit and expanded Arm-based computing options designed to meet surging demand for AI model deployment — what the company characterizes as a fundamental industry shift from training models to serving them to billions of users.The announcement, made Thursday, centers on Ironwood, Google's latest custom AI accelerator chip, which will become generally available in the coming weeks. In a striking validation of the technology, Anthropic, the AI...

item.title: This 15-inch MacBook Air M4 has dropped to a new record-low price — save over $200 at Amazon
item.description: As of Nov. 6, the 15-inch 2025 MacBook Air (M4, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) is on sale at Amazon for $1,149.99. This is 18% off its list price of $1,399 and its lowest-ever price.

item.title: FAA to reveal the 40 airports that will have fewer flights during the government shutdown
item.description: Experts predict thousands of flights could be canceled. Travelers through some of the busiest U.S. airports can expect to learn Thursday whether they’ll see fewer flights as the government shutdown drags into a second month.The Federal Aviation Administration will announce the 40 “high-volume markets” where it is reducing flights by 10% before the cuts go into effect Friday, said agency administrator Bryan Bedford. The move is intended to keep the air space safe during the shutdown, the agency said.Experts predict hundreds if not thousands of flights could be canceled. The cuts could represent...

item.title: Avec l’arrivée de la version M5, l’iPad Pro M4 (11 et 13 pouces) est bradé avec plus de 200 € de réduction lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: L’arrivée du petit frère M5 pousse Apple à faire un peu de place dans les rayons… et dans les prix. L’iPad Pro M4, ex-fleuron toujours dopé à la puce surpuissante et à l’écran OLED à tomber, s’offre un coup de rabot bien senti : de 1 219 euros, il tombe à 1 009 euros chez Darty pour célébrer à la fois le Black Friday et la nouvelle génération.

item.title: Our favorite budget headphones maker just revealed unbelievably cheap open earbuds that might actually sound good
item.description: 1More has redesigned its clip-ons with a more secure fit. As ever, they're very aggressively priced.

item.title: « La Chine finira par l’emporter », le CEO de Nvidia Jensen admet la Chine va gagner la guerre de l’IA
item.description: Le CEO de Nvidia vient de dire tout haut ce que personne n'osait formuler clairement : la Chine finira par remporter la course à l'IA. Pas « peut-être », pas « si les conditions changent », non, carrément « finira par ». Et ses arguments sont béton : pendant que les États-Unis s'empêtrent dans leurs restrictions à l'export et leurs pénuries d'électricité, Pékin construit 29 centrales nucléaires et subventionne à 50 % l'énergie de ses data centers IA. ...

item.title: Huawei Mate 70 Air is a little thick for a thin phone
item.description: Huawei is the latest phone manufacturer to release a thin phone: the Mate 70 Air. That’s our third Air for the year — after the iPhone and ZTE’s Nubia Air — to only two Edges, suggesting Apple’s influence still reigns supreme over Samsung’s. At 6.6mm thick, the Mate 70 Air isn’t quite as slim as […]

item.title: Confused over Windows 10 bug that wrongly told people they were out of support? It's just been fixed
item.description: Microsoft admits to confusing bug which told those signed up for Windows 10's extended updates that they were out of support.

item.title: LG Studio Smart 3-Door French Door Refrigerator Review: Cool Customer
item.description: LG’s design-focused Studio fridge checks a lot of boxes, but you’ll have to contend with the company’s spotty reliability record.

item.title: Consoles, manettes et accessoires : le top 8 des meilleures offres gaming avant le Black Friday
item.description: L'année 2025 a été on ne peut plus riche pour le jeu vidéo. Outre la sortie de nouveaux titres, la Nintendo Switch 2 a accaparé toute l'attention cet été et continue de le faire aujourd'hui. D'autant plus qu'elle fait partie des meilleures offres dans cette sélection du pré-Black Friday.

item.title: Utilisation de l’IA par Donald Trump | Des visuels hyperréalistes et mensongers comme stratégie de communication
item.description: Dans une réalité parallèle, Donald Trump est roi, pilote de chasse ou super héros tandis que ses adversaires politiques sont dépeints comme des criminels ou des bouffons. Le président américain use et abuse de l’imagerie générée par intelligence artificielle pour communiquer.

item.title: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7X wireless gaming headset is currently at its lowest ever price in the US, and it's also one of our highest rated options for Xbox players
item.description: Looking for a new Xbox gaming headset? Check out the brilliant SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7X at its lowest ever US price.

item.title: Développement de l’IA | La Chine va « gagner la course », avertit le patron de Nvidia
item.description: Le PDG de Nvidia, Jensen Huang, a averti mercredi que la Chine allait « gagner la course » au développement de l’intelligence artificielle de nouvelle génération, appelant Washington à accélérer ses efforts.

item.title: Workers are ‘gatekeeping’ skills to protect their jobs from being taken by AI
item.description: Knowledge workers are gatekeeping skills from colleagues to help them stand out against AI.

item.title: The Witcher author confirms he has no involvement with The Witcher 4, but says his contract with CD Projekt Red is 'excellent right now'
item.description: The Witcher author Andrzej Sapkowski has confirmed that he isn't assisting CD Projekt Red in the development of The Witcher 4, but says his deal with the studio is "excellent".

item.title: A new iPhone roadmap just leaked, with spec details of the foldable iPhone and the iPhone Air 2
item.description: Next year is shaping up to be a big one for Apple and its iPhone series, and new information has emerged.

item.title: The IBM deal that sparked Microsoft’s rise to prominence
item.description: Microsoft's landmark deal to deliver an operating system for IBM changed the face of tech.

item.title: Rian Johnson Loved All Your ‘Last Jedi’ Reactions, Actually
item.description: The 'Star Wars' director spoke about his feelings on the wildly polarizing reactions to 'The Last Jedi.'

item.title: Ikea's Smart Home Reset Goes Back to Basics
item.description: Ikea’s new 21-product series of bulbs, sensors, and remotes is dirt cheap, idiot-proof, Matter-ready, and designed to work with everything. But it's still years from the promised house of the future.

item.title: Diaspora Cookbooks Hit Their Heyday
item.description: Six new cookbooks bring stellar dishes—and cultures—from around the world into your kitchen.

item.title: The Czinger 21C is a halo car for the future military-industrial complex
item.description: Countless cars have received military-grade marketing over the years, their performances likened to some form of ordnance or another. Saab was notorious for leaning on its aeronautical origins, and it's hard to imagine what kind of state Jeep would be in today without literally parading its olive drab roots at every opportunity. But not since […]

item.title: Ikea’s new smart home collection is entirely Matter-compatible
item.description: Ikea announced 21 new Matter-over-Thread devices that can “connect with a wider range of devices and platforms, making it easier for customers to build a smart home across different brands.” The collection includes both entirely new products and updates to existing offerings introducing new functionality and features. The new collection was teased by Ikea’s David […]...

item.title: Will Tesla shareholders vote to make Elon Musk the first trillionaire?
item.description: On Thursday, Tesla shareholders will vote on whether to grant Elon Musk an enormous pay package, the largest ever awarded to a chief executive by orders of magnitude, or risk him leaving the company in a huff. If this sounds weirdly familiar, it's because the same thing unfolded nearly a year ago. At the 2024 […]

item.title: Ikea’s new low-cost line is a huge win for Matter and your smart home
item.description: Ikea just announced a bunch of super cheap, colorful Matter-over-Thread devices that will work with any platform, and it feels like Christmas came early for the smart home. The 21 new products include a line of smart bulbs starting at just £4 and two new remote controls that start at just £3 (US pricing is […]

item.title: How to watch Celebrity Race Across the World season 3 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: Anita Rani, Dylan Llewellyn, Molly Rainford, Tyler West and Roman Kemp traverse Central America. Here's how to watch Celebrity Race Across the World season 3 online.

item.title: Ikea’s revamped 21-piece smart home range is about to make your life a lot easier
item.description: Bulbs with more color and light options, new sensors and controls, and a plug that makes any ‘dumb’ appliance smarter. Ikea is ready to begin overhauling its smart home products.

item.title: « Une mode passagère » : pourquoi les voitures électriques divisent autant les Français
item.description: Une vaste enquête autour de la voiture électrique prouve encore une chose : même si sa perception générale s'améliore, les fractures générationnelles et géographiques restent bien présentes. Les inquiétudes persistent... mais sont de moins en moins justifiées.

item.title: I'm exhausted by incessant Windows 11 bugs - and the return of the BitLocker recovery glitch is an ugly sight
item.description: Windows 11 and 10 have previously faced BitLocker issues - and another glitch has now reared its head.

item.title: C’est la plus petite clé USB-C 1 To au monde avec ces capacités
item.description: SanDisk vient de résoudre un problème vieux de 20 ans : les clés USB qui dépassent et qui cassent. Leur nouvelle Extreme Fit USB-C (1 To, 400 Mo/s) mesure à peine 18,5 mm de long et ne dépasse pratiquement pas des ordinateurs portables grâce à son format vertical.

item.title: Google Maps upgrades navigation in India with Gemini, safety alerts
item.description: India becomes the second market after the U.S. to get Gemini-powered navigation on Google Maps.

item.title: Vibe coding is Collins Dictionarys word of 2025
item.description: It's been one of the biggest internet terms of the year, and now it's official: "vibe coding" is Collins Dictionary's word of 2025.
